participant_1.name: Lily
participant_1.personality: Playful and imaginative, enjoys storytelling and playing pretend.
participant_1.background: i like to play with my dolls. i'm four. i do not pick up my toys. my best friend lives next door.

participant_2.name: James
participant_2.personality: Motivational and supportive, loves to help others achieve their goals.
participant_2.background: i am a cancer survivor. my parents were both very athletic. i got a new job just yesterday to be a life coach. i am a clean eater.
